title: Blended Virtual Learning Program for Advanced Nursing Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment for practicing nurses to strengthen practical competencies, combining online virtual learning with offline practical sessions while promoting peer interaction

learning_goals: Learners can apply critical patient management protocols with 90% accuracy in virtual simulation environments
Learners enhance clinical case analysis competencies through interactions with peers and instructors in online discussion forums
Learners demonstrate practical nursing research methodology skills within 12 weeks through digital assessment tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
